column5:
Explore Marine Resource Management at a global top 100* university.
             

              On this double award MSc in Global Marine Resource Management, you'll undertake cross-disciplinary study in a multinational setting, studying at both the University of Southampton and at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST).
             

              You'll be introduced to the multi-disciplinary sphere of marine science including physical, chemical, biological oceanography, and marine geology. You'll explore the potential and sustainable utilisation of marine resources.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
